H0.text: Lightning is an example of a form of electrical energy.

H1.text: Windmill is an example of a form of electrical energy.

H2.text: Radio waves are an example of a form of electrical energy.

H3.text: Sound waves are an example of a form of electrical energy.

A4.text: The charge carrier in lightning is mainly electrons in a plasma.

A5.text: The electric current of the return stroke averages 30 kiloamperes for a typical negative CG flash.
